articles.description: SEC play means more visitors.
articles.content: Once the college football season got going, recruiting slowed down a bit. This week, it has amped back up again. Bama picked up two commitments in DE Jordan Renaud and WR Jalen Hale. This Saturday is… [+2367 chars]

articles.description: The Hokies fell to the Mountaineers at home, 33-10 to fall to 2-2 on the season. WR Kaleb Smith was the bright spot for the Virginia Tech offense in the batt...
